channel.title: OMG I Need Help : Port Forwarding
channel.description: Ok guys i've tried everything to do it and idk, can someone please help me!! I have a 2wire 2701 HG-B Router/Modem Idk i've tried but i guess i didnt do it right please help!!!!!!

item.title: OMG I Need Help : Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @GoranTheSerb GoranTheSerb
item.description:
@GoranTheSerb wrote:

Liquid Magic:

Bridge the modem to the router, disable your NAT, and make sure your set static IP is not something like: xxx.xxx.x.100+, more like: xxx.xxx.x.70-99. Report forward and have fun.

Umm How do i do this? lOl can u help me?

Read full topic
item.source: OMG I Need Help : Port Forwarding

item.title: OMG I Need Help : Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Bridge the modem to the router, disable your NAT, and make sure your set static IP is not something like: xxx.xxx.x.100+, more like: xxx.xxx.x.70-99. Report forward and have fun.

Read full topic
